document.full_text: the pacific northwest chapter of the roman catholic church's jesuit order has agreed to pay $166 million to settle more than 500 child sexual abuse claims against priests in five states, attorneys said on friday.
document.title: northwest jesuits reach $166 million sex abuse settlement
lines_and_colors: the pacific northwest chapter of the roman catholic church's jesuit order has agreed to pay $166 million to settle more than 500 child sexual abuse claims against priests in five states, attorneys said on friday.
